column4: i press right click on an .exe file and i try to open it with wine and nothing happens. What i should do?
i press right click on an .exe file and i try to open it with wine and nothing happens. What i should do?
look for a guide for the application you want to run at appdb.winehq.org
anyway, to see error messages, you have to run your program in a terminal-window: 'wine ~/.drive_c/Programs/YourProgram/foobar.exe'
